solution_line_template: For each class, he has to review the questions of {students_per_class} students, in total, he will review {questions_per_exam} * {students_per_class} = <<{questions_per_exam}*{students_per_class}={questions_per_class}>>{questions_per_class} questions.

For the {num_classes} classes, he will review a total of {questions_per_class} * {num_classes} = <<{questions_per_class}*{num_classes}={total_questions_reviewed}>>{total_questions_reviewed} questions.
